nodes.text: InQuest 39 was a roleplaying magazine from July 1998. It contained many articles, including an addition to the Star Wars CCG called "Mirror, Mirror", which was written by Michael Mikaelian and Jason Robinette, as well as an article for the West End Games Star Wars D6 system called "Terminators: Five Movie Monsters to Torment Your PCs" was written by Kenneth Hite.

In the "Mirror Mirror" article published in InQuest 39, Wizard Entertainment gave an explanation for the Star Trek and Star Wars universes being joined together so that CCG players could use the two systems together. In addition there are many Terminator references that are not an official part of the Star Wars Universe.
